Reviews.Title: “Quiet location, just off tram route, clean, friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: vincefowler
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel 2 nights beginning june 2011 located quiet residential city round corner 16 tram stop runs city centre central station vondel park 400 metres pizzeria caferestaurants popular locals 300 metres third floor clean comfortable breakfast provided comprising juices cereals boiled egg ham cheese preserves price considering amsterdam prices

Reviews.Title: “Priceline 3 star city center bid will get you THIS! Go outside the center for a better deal and easy tram access!”

Reviews.Content: 3 star bid city decent clean inn etc hotel ams bb bid 45 star basement gross mirror falling wall bad carpet tiny bathroom tile broken mold etc gross pros near amsterdam sigh tram safe neighborhood beautiful trees apartments etc ambiance cons 20 minute walk besides museums horrible service check 11 priceline 12 7 euro departure hotel tax top priceline payment bad internet hear word neighbors 2 am hear expand bit city center south slightly farther residential 510 min city left hell hole 5 star 175 5 minute tram ride gotten 34 star cheaper pay unlimited tram card ground train easy access eveything city easily bottom line hotel im flight attendant stayed pretty bad worst
